item.title: Antidot for the anti-zionis worm with sample file and source code
item.dc:creator: Panggi Libersa Jasri Akadol
item.content:encoded:
Just to share!! :-) i opened up my "Malware Oriented" folders and found this . I named it "antizionis" because there's a message about it when the computer get infected.

I wrote the antidot at July 1st 2009 because my friend's computer got infected and no antivirus detected it. OK here are the details after i decompiled it :

CRC32 : C5CF905E
File Size : 131.139 Byte

%SystemRoot%\system32\060785.bat
-------------------------
HKLM\SYSTEM\ControlSet003\Control\SafeBoot\AlternateShell
c:\windows\Help\explorer.exe
-------------------------
HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\Explorer\NoFolderOptions
HKLM\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\SystemRestore\DisableConfig
HKLM\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\SystemRestore\DisableSR
HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\SCRNSAVE.EXE
HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\ScreenSaveTimeOut
c:\ahmad ahdi haikal zaqi nasia.exe
\system32\aparaparsaparyangparipircapar.exe
\system32\300403.exe
pilem lutchu\Doraemon-Pistol Perubah Tubuh Sebagian.rm.exe
pilem lutchu\Sinchan-Menginap Di Sekolah.rm.exe
pilem lutchu\TOM & JERRY 2.rm.exe
c:\antiZionisme.rm.exe
HKCR\.reg\shell
HKCR\.reg\shell\Merge\
HKCR\.reg\shell\Merge\command\
HKCR\.txt\
HKCR\.txt\shell
HKCR\.txt\shell\Open\command\
HKCR\*\shellex\ContextMenuHandlers\Open With\
HKCR\.htm\
HKCR\.html\
HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Folder\SuperHidden\UncheckedValue
HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Folder\Hidden\SHOWALL\CheckedValue
HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Folder\Hidden\SHOWALL\DefaultValue
HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Folder\Hidden\NOHIDDEN\CheckedValue
HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Folder\Hidden\NOHIDDEN\DefaultValue
HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\\Policies\System\NoDispScrSavPage
HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Hidden
HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\HideFileExt
HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\MenuShowDelay
HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\AutoEndTasks
----------------
HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\App Paths\MSCONFIG.EXE\
%SystemRoot%\system32\appdata.vbs
----------------Save
\system32\run4.bat
\system32\HacKid'#39's.exe
%SystemRoot%\system32\050587.vbs

the source code and sample file of the worm can be downloaded at http://static.malcoder.info/antizionis.zip
